text: You too, Brutus, my son? He managed to ask in a voice that was equally sad and surprised. What's going on! It's just politics, there's no personal motivation, Brutus explained, and he gave him another tip with the dagger. Personally, I have nothing against you, Dad. "Oh, then I'm sorry, I didn't mean to offend you", said Caesar, and he died. FIN
title: Es solo política
author: Slawomir Mrozek
